content: प्रभ्रंश् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To fall or drop down, slip; प्रभ्रश्यमानाभरणप्रसूना <ls>R. 14. 54.</ls> {@--2@} To lose, be deprived of; प्रभ्रश्यते तेजसः <ls>Mk. 1. 14.</ls> {@--3@} To escape or free oneself from. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To throw or bring down from, cause to fall down from; प्रभ्रंशयां यो नहुषं चकार <ls>R. 13. 36.</ls>
